institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 43 (Preservation of documents)
contents: Article 43 (Preservation of Documents) ① In accordance with Article 9 of the Operational Regulations and Article 10 of the Rules, the Chairman shall preserve documents related to the screening for selection of business groups, extension of support period, change of business plan, etc. for the following periods: 1. The written opinion and scorecard according to the business plan review (including the regular training course review scorecard) shall be submitted 3 years from the business start date of the relevant year (can be replaced with an electronic document); 2. For the selection of a new business group or review of the next year's business plan The business plan must be submitted until the final business plan is submitted. 3. The final business plan based on the review results of the judging panel and the business plan deliberation/decision is 2 years from the business start date of the relevant year. 4. The business plan changed due to changes in the business plan is the business start date of the relevant year. 2 years from ② The business group must preserve documents related to the operation of the industry-led training project for the following periods: 1. The business plan for screening for selecting a new business group or reviewing the next year's business plan until the business end date of the relevant year, 2 The final business plan based on the review results and business plan deliberation and resolution is 6 years from the business start date of the relevant year. 3. The revised business plan due to changes in the business plan is 6 years from the business start date of the relevant year. 4. Training course operation and government. Documents related to the subsidy are kept for 5 years from the date the settlement was completed (in the case of training costs that are not settled, the date of receipt of the subsidy).
